landing.heroSubtitle: Savdhan Naari empowers women with real-time emergency alerts, smart watch integration, and instant SOS — because your safety should never wait.
landing.missionText: We believe every woman deserves to feel safe. Savdhan Naari combines smart wearable technology with instant emergency response to create a safety net that's always with you.
landing.feature1Desc: One-tap emergency alert that notifies your trusted contacts and nearby authorities instantly.
landing.feature2Desc: Heart rate monitoring, fall detection, and motion analysis through your wearable device.
landing.feature3Desc: Share your real-time location with trusted contacts during emergencies.
landing.feature4Desc: Cancel false alarms with your secure 4-digit emergency PIN within 30 seconds.

landing.step2Desc: Pair your smart watch for continuous health and safety monitoring.
landing.step3Desc: Get real-time alerts and instant SOS when danger is detected.
